column4: could anyone help me with libbonobo2-Common files for gnome network?

nathan1993: but im having trouble installing certain librarys
the apt-get will get all the needed libraries.
nathan1993: it says dependency is not satisfiable: libbonobo2-Common
nathan1993: i dont have an internet connection though, im only have a connection in windows, im using a dual boot, but if i get my adapter to work i might remove windows
have you done an apt-get update after editing your /etc/apt/sources.list?
marcn: to be totally honest, i havnt a clue, becuase i am a total newbie
it is very rare that you ever have to download a .deb and use dpkg to install it.  apt-get/aptitude/synaptic/etc all will find all dependancies and download them for you.
did you just upgrade to edgy?  this is a good idea:    sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
but dont i need and internet connection to upgrade
but dont i need and internet connection to upgrade?
